33: נֶֽגַע־ <sup>5061 </sup> <n>A wound</n> וְקָל֥וֹן <sup>7036 </sup> <n>and dishonour</n> יִמְצָ֑א <sup>4672 </sup> <n>shall he get</n> וְ֝חֶרְפָּת֗וֹ <sup>2781 </sup> <n>and his reproach</n> לֹ֣א <sup>3808 </sup> <n>not</n> תִמָּחֶֽה׃ <sup>4229 </sup> <n>shall not be wiped away</n>
34: כִּֽי־ <sup>3588 </sup> <n>For</n> קִנְאָ֥ה <sup>7068 </sup> <n>For jealousy</n> חֲמַת־ <sup>2534 </sup> <n>[is] the rage</n> גָּ֑בֶר <sup>1397 </sup> <n>of a man</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>and he will not</n> יַ֝חְמ֗וֹל <sup>2550 </sup> <n>therefore he will not spare</n> בְּי֣וֹם <sup>3117 </sup> <n>in the day</n> נָקָֽם׃ <sup>5359 </sup> <n>of vengeance</n>
35: לֹא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יִ֭שָּׂא <sup>5375 </sup> <n>accept</n> פְּנֵ֣י <sup>6440 </sup> <n>accept</n> כָל־ <sup>3605 </sup> <n>any</n> כֹּ֑פֶר <sup>3724 </sup> <n>any ransom</n> וְלֹֽא־ <sup>3808 </sup> <n>Nor</n> יֹ֝אבֶ֗ה <sup>14 </sup> <n>neither will he rest content</n> כִּ֣י <sup>3588 </sup> <n>though</n> תַרְבֶּה־ <sup>7235 </sup> <n>though thou givest many</n> שֹֽׁחַד׃ <sup>7810 </sup> <n>gifts</n> פ
